name: ChogaBot : GUI-centric Java IRC bot
short_description: ChogaBot is a GUI-centric IRC bot written in Java. Performs all standard channel maintenance and protection operations that one would expect. Features (so far) include fine-tuned configuration on a per channel basis, logging, and a plugin architecture.
